participating-org.narrative:
Type of organization: MAAMS is non profit organisation of Congolese Law. History: MAAMS was created o 31st of January 1998 to contribute to promotion of human rights. It is operational under legal status F 92 /20.901, N° J/SG/20/4362/2013, of Ministrybylaw N° RDC/284/GS/CAB/MIN/AFF-SAH.SN/011 of 28th of September 2011.
Development and aims of the counterpart:
Provide assistance to vulnerable populations affected by natural disasters, conflicts and to contribute to the promotion of human rights. Work together with other organizations:
MAAMS works according to various opportunities related to assistance to marginalized groups and victims of conflictsand natural disasters. Its work is done in collaboration with both national and internationalNGOs and agencies of United Nations such as : Oxfam Novib, Oxfam GRANDE BRETAGNE, HCR, HELPAGE INTERNATIONAL, CARE INTERNATIONAL, FNUAP, PNUD. MAAMS is also an active actor in Clusters Food Security, Health, Protection and NFI. Relationship with Oxfam Novib: MAAMS is ONL#s partners since 2011 under programme reinforcement of humanitarian capacities of local organisations partners of Oxfam.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security
